mapper.select: SELECT fo.FRCS_ORDER_NO , fo.FRCS_NO , fo.FRCS_ORDER_DT , fo.FRCS_ORDER_ORDER_AMT , fo.FRCS_ORDER_TYPE_CD , (SELECT f.FRCS_NM FROM FRANCHISE f WHERE f.FRCS_NO = fo.FRCS_NO ) FRCS_NM FROM FRCS_ORDER fo WHERE fo.FRCS_ORDER_TYPE_CD = 'FODST01' ORDER BY fo.FRCS_ORDER_NO DESC

select r.RY_CLM_YM, r.FRCS_NO, r.RY_TOTAL_AMT, r.RY_STATUS_YN, r.RY_PAY_DT, r.RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT, r.RY_ORDER_AMT, r.RY_NPMNT_AMT, r.RY_OVRINT_AMT, r.RY_ROYALTY_AMT, f.FRCS_NM, (select count(*) from ROYALTY where FRCS_NO = r.FRCS_NO and RY_NPMNT_AMT > 0) as accNpmntCnt from ROYALTY r, FRANCHISE f where r.FRCS_NO = f.FRCS_NO and R.RY_STATUS_YN = 'N' and r.RY_CLM_YM = #{viewDate}

WITH AllMonths AS ( SELECT DISTINCT to_char(hq_order_dt, 'yyyy-MM') AS month FROM hq_order UNION SELECT DISTINCT to_char(to_date(ry_clm_ym, 'yyyy-MM'), 'yyyy-MM') AS month FROM royalty ) SELECT m.month, COALESCE(I.hqOrderTotalAmt, 0) AS hqOrderTotalAmt, COALESCE(O.ryTotalAmt, 0) AS ryTotalAmt FROM AllMonths m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT to_char(hq_order_dt, 'yyyy-MM') AS hqOrderDt, sum(hq_order_total_amt) AS hqOrderTotalAmt FROM hq_order GROUP BY to_char(hq_order_dt, 'yyyy-MM') ) I ON m.month = I.hqOrderDt LEFT JOIN ( SELECT to_char(to_date(ry_clm_ym, 'yyyy-MM'), 'yyyy-MM') AS ryClmYm, sum(ry_total_amt) AS ryTotalAmt FROM royalty WHERE ry_status_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY to_date(ry_clm_ym, 'yyyy-MM') ) O ON m.month = O.ryClmYm ORDER BY m.month DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(p.pynm_total_amt) DESC) AS rank, f.frcs_no as frcsNo, f.frcs_nm as frcsNm, f.frcs_opng_dt as frcsOpngDt, f.frcs_ownr_no as frcsOwnrNo, SUM(p.pynm_total_amt) as totalAmtSum
FROM franchise f JOIN payment p ON f.frcs_no = p.frcs_no WHERE f.frcs_sts_cd = #{comDetCode} GROUP BY f.frcs_no, f.frcs_nm, f.frcs_opng_dt, f.frcs_ownr_no ) WHERE rank <= 3
